name: Throwback: Revenge of the squirrels
description:
Help the squirrels save the forest and take revenge on the lumberjack.

Thanks to Arthur & Eric for helping me with the idea for the game.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move the squirrel.

Enter or space to (re)start/pause the game.

Softwares/Plugin used:

Godot Engine

Krita

sfxr

SimpleGodotCRTShader

Source: https://github.com/guilhermefelipecgs/throwback
developers: Guilherme Felipe de C. G. da Silva
